channel.title: Projects on Dr. Yue Hu's Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Dr. Yue Hu's Personal Page

item.title: Language and Language Politics In China
item.description: A study of language policy and its influences in Chinese society and politics

item.title: Measure Political Desirability
item.description: A joint project with Wenfang Tang about measuring political desirability using a sensitive-questioning skill.

item.title: State Media and Its Audience?
item.description: A joint project with Zijie Shao about state media in China and its audience’s characteristics and causality of watching

item.title: Motivations for Labor Migration in China
item.description: A joint study with Elise Pizzi about the motivations and opinions of internal migrants of contemporary China

item.title: Is Smart Power Really Smart?
item.description: A joint project with Ray Ou-Yang of soft-hard power dynamic in the post-WII history with network analysis
